revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WR940N |revision=v3.x |series=N450 |asin=B003Y5RYNY, B00MIFM3R8 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |fcc_date=02/04/2015 |fcc_id=TE7WR941NXV6 |pcb_id=2050500569 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=TP9343;TP9343-AL3A, E5A826B, 1406, TAIWAN; |cpu1_cspeed=750 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q32FVSIG |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model=A3S56D40GTP-50L |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=TP9343;TP9343-AL3A, E5A826B, 1406, TAIWAN; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }} {{TagLine|450Mbps Wireless N Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/cat-9_TL-WR940N.html Product page]
3x 5dBi Fixed Omni Directional Antenna
*[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr940n On '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
The TP-Link WR940N is identical to the TL-WR941ND (detachable) except that :the antennas are not detachable and the hardware version is different. :(N - fixed (integral) antennas, ND - removable antennas) :*[[TP-LINK TL-WR940N v1.x]] - [[TP-LINK TL-WR941ND v4.x]] :*[[TP-LINK TL-WR940N v2.x]] - [[TP-LINK TL-WR941ND v5.x]] :*[[TP-LINK TL-WR940N v3.x]] - [[TP-LINK TL-WR941ND v6.x]]
==Images== <gallery> File:tp-wr940n_v3.lq.jpg|Board top </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
